00025 struct impRange_t {
00027    bool operator == ( int layerID ) {
00028       return m_layerID == layerID;
00029    }
00030    
00032    int m_layerID;
00034    int m_firstImp;
00036    int m_lastImp;
00037 };

00275 // --- Inlines
00276 inline const impRange_t&
00277 TilesNotice::getImpRange( const TileMapParams& param ) const
00278 {
00279    impRange_t* const endIt = m_impRange + m_nbrLayers;
00280    const impRange_t* findit = 
00281       std::find( m_impRange, endIt,
00282                  param.getLayer() );
00283    // Note that the layer must be found, or else it's an error.
00284    MC2_ASSERT( findit != endIt );
00285    return *findit;
00286 }
00287 
00288 inline int 
00289 TilesNotice::getOffset( const TileMapParams& param ) const 
00290 {
00291    if ( param.getTileIndexLat() < m_startLatIdx ||
00292         param.getTileIndexLat() > m_endLatIdx ||
00293         param.getTileIndexLon() < m_startLonIdx ||
00294         param.getTileIndexLon() > m_endLonIdx ) {
00295       return -1;
00296    }
00297 
00298    impRange_t* const endIt = m_impRange + m_nbrLayers;
00299    const impRange_t* findit = 
00300       std::find( m_impRange, endIt,
00301                  param.getLayer() );
00302    MC2_ASSERT( findit != endIt );
00303 
00304    if ( param.getImportanceNbr() < findit->m_firstImp ||
00305         param.getImportanceNbr() > findit->m_lastImp ) {
00306       // Outside the importance range.
00307       return -1;
00308    }
00309    
00310    int width = m_endLonIdx - m_startLonIdx + 1;
00311 
00312    return m_offset + 
00313           ( width * ( param.getTileIndexLat() - m_startLatIdx ) + 
00314             param.getTileIndexLon() - m_startLonIdx ) * offsetEntrySize;
00315 }
00316 
00317 inline TilesNotice* 
00318 TilesForAllDetailsNotice::getTilesForDetail( int detail ) 
00319 {
00320    return
00321       const_cast<TilesNotice*>( const_cast<const TilesForAllDetailsNotice*>
00322                                ( this )->getTilesForDetail( detail ) );
00323 }
00324 
00325 inline const TilesNotice* 
00326 TilesForAllDetailsNotice::getTilesForDetail( int detail ) const
00327 {
00328    int offset = detail - m_startDetail;
00329    if ( offset >= 0 && offset < (int) m_tilesNotice.size() ) {
00330       return &m_tilesNotice[ offset ];
00331    } else {
00332       return NULL;
00333    }
00334 }
00335 
00336 inline int 
00337 TilesForAllDetailsNotice::getOffset( const TileMapParams& param ) const 
00338 {
00339    const TilesNotice* notice = getTilesForDetail( param.getDetailLevel() );
00340 
00341    if ( notice == NULL ) {
00342       return -1;
00343    }
00344 
00345    return notice->getOffset( param );
00346 }
00347 
00348 const TilesNotice*
00349 TilesForAllDetailsNotice::getNotice( const TileMapParams& param ) const
00350 {
00351    const TilesNotice* notice = getTilesForDetail( param.getDetailLevel() );
00352 
00353    return notice;
00354 }
00355 
00356 const TilesNotice*
00357 TileCollectionNotice::getNotice( const TileMapParams& param ) const 
00358 {
00359    int layerID = param.getLayer();
00360    
00361    std::map<int,int>::const_iterator it = m_indexByLayerID.find( layerID );
00362    if ( it == m_indexByLayerID.end() ) {
00363       return NULL;
00364    } 
00365   
00366    return m_tilesForAllDetails[ (*it).second ].getNotice( param );
00367 }
00368 
00369 inline int 
00370 TileCollectionNotice::getOffset( const TileMapParams& param ) const
00371 {
00372    int layerID = param.getLayer();
00373    
00374    map<int,int>::const_iterator it = m_indexByLayerID.find( layerID );
00375    if ( it == m_indexByLayerID.end() ) {
00376       return -1;
00377    } 
00378 
00379    mc2dbg8 << "[TCN]: getOffset " << param.getAsString() << " at "
00380            << m_tilesForAllDetails[ (*it).second ].getOffset( param )
00381            << endl;
00382 
00383    return m_tilesForAllDetails[ (*it).second ].getOffset( param );
00384 }
